verdict.summary: TCP connection refused. Target server not running or wrong host/port.

dead_ends.why_fails: Connection refused is immediate — timeout doesn't help
If the server expects TCP, switching to UDP won't work

workarounds.action: Verify the server is running on the expected host:port
workarounds.how: curl -v http://localhost:PORT  # or: ss -tlnp | grep PORT

workarounds.action: Check if using IPv6 [::1] vs IPv4 127.0.0.1 — server may only listen on one
workarounds.how: :1] vs IPv4 127.0.0.1 — server may only listen on one

workarounds.action: Add retry logic with backoff for services that start slowly

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'dial tcp [' is a network_error error while 'http' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
